title: Fragment, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: damassé (5-harness satin, interruption of 2, warp-faced for background plus 4/1 twill, weft-faced for pattern)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 370 x 51 cm (12 ft. 1 11/16 in. x 20 1/16 in.)
description: Allover pattern in yellow and green of two types of long curved flowering plants: one type in one row, the other in the next row in offset alignment. Yellow silk woven weft-loop fringe attached to top, bottom and one side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 17th century.Medium: silk
Technique: damassé (5-harness satin, interruption of 2, warp-faced for background plus 4/1 twill, weft-faced for pattern). 1973-38-1.
